summary: Weekly plan tailored to MTHFR (CT), CYP1A2 (AC), and LCT (TT) findings with focus on folate optimization and caffeine moderation.

recommendations.title: Folate-rich meal targets
recommendations.details: Include at least 2 servings/day of leafy greens (spinach, kale) and 1 serving of legumes.
recommendations.why: CT genotype for MTHFR may reduce enzyme activity; dietary folate supports normal homocysteine.

recommendations.title: Caffeine cutoff
recommendations.details: Limit caffeine intake to < 200 mg after 12:00.
recommendations.why: Intermediate caffeine metabolism (CYP1A2 AC) may increase sensitivity late-day.

recommendations.title: Methylfolate (check with clinician)
recommendations.why: CT genotype may benefit from methylated folate forms.

disclaimer: Plans are guidance, not medical advice. Consult qualified professionals for diagnosis and treatment.
